titles.title: When The Spirit of the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the spirit of the Lord is within my heart
I will sing as David sang.
When the Spirit of the Lord is within my heart
I will sing as David sang.
I will sing, I will sing,
I will sing as David sang.
I will sing, I will sing,
I will sing as David sang.
When the Spirit of the Lord is within my heart
